user_query: My company is considering upgrading our technology infrastructure and we need to analyze the financials of potential vendors. Can you retrieve the balance sheet and financial details of companies in the technology industry for the past five years? It would also be helpful to see any upgrade and downgrade history for these companies.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the list of technology companies for analysis.
Collect balance sheet and financial details for each technology company for the past five years.
required_inputs: list of technology companies from step 1

TaskList.description: Gather upgrade and downgrade history for the technology companies.
required_inputs: list of technology companies from step 1

TaskList.description: Compile the financial data and upgrade/downgrade history into a report.
required_inputs: upgrade and downgrade history from step 3
